data.text: And now it's back on so we can have a holiday party!
Power outage in #EchoPark. TOM House is dark.

2023 will build on our vision for @TomsFoundation, but only with your help. Join us, won’t you?

urls.description: View this in your browser A message from TOM's Foundation ‌ ‌ As 2022 comes to an end, we enter the season of celebration and giving. Spending time with those we care about, thinking of loved ones no

data.text:
Further our mission to protect, preserve, and promote the erotic arts by gifting a membership to a friend. Perhaps consider giving to one of our special programs like the Marcello Lupetti fund to support artists of color in our #TOMair program. 

SEE MORE: https://t.co/ffhTKSw4PE https://t.co/e2IXWfORyI

Tom of Finland Foundation wouldn’t be what it is today without the participation and financial support of our Community. Help us continue our year-round programming by becoming a member today.

READ MORE: https://t.co/ffhTKSw4PE https://t.co/Qnahm2Nu4N

data.text:
As 2022 comes to an end, we enter the season of celebration and giving. Spending time with those we care about, thinking of loved ones no longer with us, and reflecting on what truly matters to us.

L.A.’s drag performers share their favorite places around town - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
Writes @isabelle.kliger in @LAmag, “A regular-looking house from the outside, it’s filled with #TomOfFinland’s homoerotic art, leather & hyper-masculine pornographic kitsch. A recognized landmark, TOM House is a haven that preserves Queer art & history.”

https://t.co/dlQZjRVKJH https://t.co/6jjkqMDOy8

Drag Lord of @dragdenph (premiering tomorrow 8th December) @manilaluzon selects TOM House as one of her favorite spots in Los Angeles, telling @LAmag it’s “more than a museum, it’s a time capsule of a major piece of Gay history.”

SEE MORE: https://t.co/dlQZjRVKJH https://t.co/dkVERzubsT

urls.title: L.A.’s drag performers share their favorite places around town - Tom of Finland Foundation

RT @ItGetsBetterES: 🎨 “A través del arte, cuestionó y subvirtió los valores reinantes en su contexto.” — @PaveloRockstar. 🌈🇫🇮

@TomsFoundat…

RT @Alex_Orue: 🌈 “Tom of Finland: Entre el fetiche y la reivindicación gay”, por @PaveloRockstar para @SoyHomosensual. 

@TomsFoundation…

“The leather subculture, which lived in the dark, proudly came to light thanks to his art. Beyond the fetish, Tom’s art was vindication for the Gay community,” concludes @PaveloRockstar in @SoyHomosensual.

SEE MORE: https://t.co/Q40CWrJNu0 https://t.co/dqZ139CfUh

urls.title: Tom of Finland: between fetish and Gay vindication - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
Writes @PaveloRockstar for @SoyHomosensual, “Tom of Finland was very clear that the body is also a political vehicle, so he used the cult of the body as a tool to make our community visible.”

SEE MORE: https://t.co/Q40CWrJNu0 https://t.co/TFKtG1kd1n

urls.title: What we needed - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
After some time, #TomOfFinland came to realize that he could help affect change within the Gay community. He started to portray men using protection, and some works even explicitly promoted condom use. 

READ MORE: https://t.co/PidTmDeprc

#WorldAIDSDay2022 https://t.co/3vReTxFqEu

urls.title: What we needed - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
When the HIV/AIDS public health crisis emerged in the early 1980s, #TomOfFinland began to question the role his artwork played in the free love that exacerbated the spread of the virus. For a time, his aesthetic transformed.

READ MORE: https://t.co/PidTmDeprc

#WorldAIDSDay2022 https://t.co/krWK0X7Zep

urls.title: What we needed - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
On #WorldAIDSDay2022, Tom of Finland Foundation reflects on how the AIDS crisis impacted #TomOfFinland and his work.

SEE MORE: https://t.co/PidTmDwyFk https://t.co/Xtd02VpEDT

urls.description: 18th Nov 2022 - 30th Nov 2022 @ All Day -   We are pleased to present Polaroid Collages – LA/CDMX, a collection of new editions by the British artist Stuart Sandford. The imagery for these works are taken from a group of Polaroid collages originally commissioned by the New Collection, and explore the experience of living in both Los Angeles and Cuidad de Mexico as [...]

urls.title: Oscar & occult - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
From “The Picture of Dorian Gray”, to his version of “Salome”, contact within the Thelemic Order, and the spiritual dabbling of his wife Constance, Oscar Wilde had keen interest in the Occult. Join us on Wednesday 30th November at 3p at TOM House.

MORE: https://t.co/6yKVwTDQ4r https://t.co/hdgMjtc6T8

urls.title: Tom of Finland Foundation Presents - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
Procreate® digital paintings by Christopher Labine, mixed media and acrylic portraiture from Gio Black Peter, and instant film photography from José Tinoco, select work from the #tofARTfair is on view now.

SEE MORE: https://t.co/0ebffHwY3O https://t.co/BlUoOKk6xq

urls.title: Tom of Finland Foundation Presents - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
A specially-designed t-shirt by Cali Dewitt, ink on paper works by Van Jazmin, select work from the #tofARTfair is on view now and available for purchase.

SEE MORE: https://t.co/0ebffHwY3O https://t.co/kjVIeDsx3f

urls.title: Tom of Finland Foundation Presents - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
Tom of Finland Foundation presents select artwork from the #tofARTfair 2022. Showcasing a selection of unique and complementary artists, select work is on view now and available for purchase.

SEE MORE: https://t.co/0ebffHxvTm https://t.co/n5ZDNEd8xi
RT @MistressOdette: Thank you @XXXcartaXXX and @TomsFoundation for a truly special and beautifully chaotic night ❤️❤️❤️ https://t.co/VGfwQV…

Join us for RINALDO HOPF “My Return to Pleasure Park” on Sunday 20th November from 2p - 5p at TOM House.

SEE MORE: https://t.co/KeVOvPdwwP https://t.co/6B2sLc9oMX

urls.title: Rinaldo Hopf presentation and reading - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
Also on offer will be a selection of readings from volume #19 of “My Gay Eye”, an erotic yearbook containing pictures and texts by a large array of international Queer artists and writers that has been an ongoing project of Hopf’s since 2003. 

SEE MORE: https://t.co/KeVOvPdwwP https://t.co/KWoVAvnaWh

urls.title: Rinaldo Hopf presentation and reading - Tom of Finland Foundation
Rinaldo Hopf presentation and reading - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
Former #TOMair Rinaldo Hopf returns to TOM House with a new presentation of work. With “My Return to Pleasure Park”, Hopf will unveil a series of murals inspired by his original artwork created during his residency. 

SEE MORE: https://t.co/KeVOvPe4mn https://t.co/XtsufnVZGd

Check out the lookbook shot by @doolansdigest and featuring Robert Rexx & Demi Yo’ko.

SEE MORE: https://t.co/EwBjW1xWEe https://t.co/3qiUK5i3tf

urls.title: WHOLE x Tom of Finland - Tom of Finland Foundation
WHOLE x Tom of Finland - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
Taking a look at the new WHOLE x #TomOfFinland collection, “The 8-piece collection encompasses iconic artwork and imagery for t-shirts, sweaters, hoodies, and sweatpants,” writes Adriano Batista for @Fuckingyoung.

SEE MORE: https://t.co/EwBjW1xWEe https://t.co/MTi0jjoHus

“Los Angeles art clothing brand, WHOLE is dropping a capsule collaboration with Tom of Finland,” begins Adriano Batista for @Fuckingyoung.
 
SEE MORE: https://t.co/EwBjW1yutM https://t.co/BEKxIbIHTG

“At the same time, the discussion was a kind of farewell. We both knew that time was running out. It felt important that he could experience all he had so deeply loved before his death. ”

Lung disease took Tom’s power, and he died in November 1991.

urls.title: Tom of Finland (1920 - 1991) - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
It was the only time that the artist’s work was promoted in Finland during his lifetime, after being awarded the Puupäähattu Award by the Finnish Comics Society in 1990. Ilppo Pohjola’s documentary on Tom of Finland also won a Jussi Award.

READ MORE: https://t.co/1Qepau7iI2 https://t.co/vJVu7DxxlL

urls.title: Tom of Finland (1920 - 1991) - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
In the final stages of his [emphysema], Tom moved back to Helsinki. One evening, [Durk] Dehner received a call from Finland.

“You’ll never guess what I just watched on TV! I’m on the news; they talk about the biography and documentary," Tom exclaimed.

https://t.co/1Qepau7iI2 https://t.co/SLxpcLaiVJ

urls.title: Tom of Finland (1920 - 1991) - Tom of Finland Foundation

data.text:
On this day in 1991, our Co-founder and namesake Tom of Finland passed away in Helsinki. In honor of his passing, we offer an anecdote from his final days.

urls.title: Tom of Finland: Entre el fetiche y la reivindicación gay
urls.description: Tom of Finland fue un artista que reivindicó el fetiche y el homoerotismo hasta convertirse en un ícono gay. Conoce más de él y de su obra.

urls.title: STUART SANDFORD "Polaroid Collages – LA/CDMX" - Tom of Finland Foundation
urls.description: 18th Nov 2022 - 30th Nov 2022 @ All Day -   We are pleased to present Polaroid Collages – LA/CDMX, a collection of new editions by the British artist Stuart Sandford. The imagery for these works are taken from a group of Polaroid collages originally commissioned by the New Collection, and explore the experience of living in both Los Angeles and Cuidad de Mexico as [...]

urls.title: Wet and Wild in the Desert with the Tom of Finland Foundation
urls.description: At Palm Springs Pride Weekend, partygoers honored the erotic legacy of Tom of Finland, the artist who sexed up the art world establishment.

urls.title: An evening of pain with Mistress Odette and Carta Monir - Tom of Finland Foundation
urls.description: 10th Nov 2022 @ 6:30 pm - 9:00 pm - Austin-based medical dominatrix Mistress Odette and Tom of Finland Foundation artist-in-residence Carta Monir invite you to witness their most ambitious collaboration to date. Over several hours, Carta's body will serve as a canvas for Mistress Odette to apply staples, needles, livestock tattoo equipment, and scalpels. She will be transformed from a solid, contained body into [...]
